description: Fleet-dev hooks for Windows/Git Bash compatibility and skill enforcement

hooks.prompt: Check if this Bash command contains 'gh' and 'issue'. If YES: Return permissionDecision 'ask' with reason reminding to use Fleet skills instead of direct gh commands. Mapping: 'gh issue list' or 'gh issue view' → /fleet-core:review-issues skill. 'gh issue create' in claude-research → /fleet-dev:research skill. 'gh issue create' elsewhere → /fleet-core:feedback skill. If NO 'gh' and 'issue' in command: Return permissionDecision 'allow' without comment.
